name: Rocket Mania
description:
Take control of a small rocket as you fly from a launch pad to landing pad avoiding obstacles along the way! Collect hidden gems and save up to purchase new rockets which may just help you in later levels! Set best times to compare with your friends!

Features include:
  • Collect 6 Skins!
  • Set best times on every level!
  • 99 Achievements to grind for!
  • Collect hidden Gems in every level!
  • 90 levels ranging from easy to very hard!
Easy to use controls:
